rooms.description: Spacious living area with large windows facing the central courtyard.
Dining area integrated with the kitchen for an open plan layout.
Guest bedroom ensuring privacy with access to corridor leading to private balcony.
Master bedroom designed on the north side following Vastu principles for better energy flow and privacy.

openings.description: Main entrance door located in the south wall to align with auspicious Vastu directions.
Window opening in living room providing natural light from the east for a positive energy flow.
Staircase leading to upper levels positioned at a corner following Vastu guidelines.
